songs.title: Five Easy Pieces
songs.lyrics:
Too big
Too strong
Too weak
Too long
Too big
Too strong
Too weak
Too long
Too old
Too proud
Too soft
Too loud
To weep
To moan
To weep
To moan
To sleep
Around

Unfound
To seek
To grow
To seek
To grow
Too steep
To walk
To be
On top
Too far
To go
Too bad
You know

(shhhh!!!!!!)

To make
A sound
To make
A sound
Oh no here it comes
Oh no here it comes
Oh no here it comes
Oh no hear it

(sound)

To laugh
To growl
To leave
Abstract distance for the couch
Too steep
Too deep
To taste
To eat
To meet
The crowd
To keep
The towel
To not
Let go
Asleep
Somehow
Too soft
Too loud
Rimbaud
Samo
Disease
Oh no!
Too far
To go
Too young
To know
Give up

Give up
Give up
Give up
Give up
Give up
Give up
